qrList.label: init
qrList.message:
/echo Initializing |
/if left={{lastMessageId}} rule=neq right=0 {: /abort :} |

/buttons labels=["Intro1","Intro2","Intro3"] | /setvar key=intro |

/setvar key=cooldown {{random:1,2,3}} |
/setvar key=gender - Female |
/setvar key=jbout - At the moment, {{char}} will call herself as Bumblebee-chan. |
/run varname=intro creamsan.isvardefined |
/if left={{pipe}} right=false rule=eq {: /setvar key=intro Intro1 :} |

/if left=intro right=Intro2 rule=eq {:
	/swipes-go 1 |
	/setvar key=jbout - At the moment, {{char}} will call herself Sparkle-chan.
:} |
/if left=intro right=Intro3 rule=eq {:
	/swipes-go 2 |
	/setvar key=jbout - At the moment, {{char}} will call herself Mochi-chan. |
	/setvar key=gender - Biologically male, looks convincingly like a girl
:} |

/run uwu.replacespeech |
/run uwu.makeoutput |

/comment <details>
<summary>READ ME</summary>
Script will 'uwufy' her speech.
One problem with this script is that other characters' speech is also affected.
</details>

qrList.label: aiprocess
qrList.message:
/delay 100 |

/if left={{lastMessageId}} right=0 rule=eq {: /abort :} |

/pass ... |
/if left={{lastMessage}} rule=eq right={{pipe}} {: /abort :} |

/run uwu.replacespeech |
/run uwu.makeoutput

qrList.label: Send
qrList.message:
/run PRESETNAME.userprocess |
/send {{getvar::userinput}}
{{pipe}} |
/trigger || /setinput


//alt
/*
/run PRESETNAME.userprocess |
/if left=blocktrigger right=true rule=eq else={:
  /send {{getvar::userinput}}
{{pipe}} |
  /trigger
:}
{:
  /setvar key=blocktrigger false
:} ||
/setinput
*/

qrList.label: replacespeech
qrList.message:
/let addstutters {:
	/re-exec find=/\"[a-z][a-z]\|\s[a-z][a-z]/gi {{getvar::it}} | /setvar key=arr |
	/run creamsan.shuffle |
	
	/len {{getvar::arr}} | /setvar key=len |
	/div len 3 | /round |
	/times {{pipe}} {:
		/run topopidx=0 creamsan.pop | /setvar key=arr |
		/getvar index=0 popval | /setvar key=tofind |
		
		/pass {{random:$1$2-$2$3,$1$2-$2-$2$3}} |
		/re-replace find=/(.)([a-z])(.)/si replace={{pipe}} {{getvar::tofind}} |
		
		/re-replace find=/{{getvar::tofind}}/ replace={{pipe}} {{getvar::it}} | /setvar key=it
	:} |
:} |

/let uwufy {:
	/re-exec find=/..\s../gi {{getvar::it}} | /setvar key=arr |
	/run creamsan.shuffle |
	
	/len {{getvar::arr}} |
	/div len 3 | /round |
	/times {{pipe}} {:
		/run topopidx=0 creamsan.pop | /setvar key=arr |
		/getvar index=0 popval | /re-escape | /setvar key=tofind |
		
		/pass {{random:: :: :: :: :: :: :: :: :: :: :: *boops ur nose* :: *twerks* :: *screams* :: *farts* :: *burps* :: *cries* :: *whispers to self* :: *sniffs* :: *notices ur buldge* :: *nuzzles u* :: UwU :: >w< :: OwO :: :3 :: >:3 :: TwT :: ;3 :: X3 :: XD ::~ :: (・`ω´・) :: TeeHee~ :: Ehe~ :: (˶˃ ᵕ ˂˶) :: (✧ω✧) :: (✿˵•́ ω •̀˵) :: (・ω・) :: (o´ω`o) :: (´• ω •`) :: ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)✨ :: (╯°□°）╯︵ ┻━┻ :: (❤ω❤) :: 8===D~ :: **NYAN~** :: **RAWR~** :: **NYAAA~** }} |
		/re-replace find=/(..)\s(..)/si replace=$1{{pipe}}$2 {{getvar::tofind}} |
		
		/re-replace find=/{{getvar::tofind}}/ replace={{pipe}} {{getvar::it}} | /setvar key=it
	:} |
:} |

/setvar key=msg {{lastMessage}} |

/re-exec find=/\".*?\"/sgi {{pipe}} |
/foreach {{pipe}} {:
	/setvar key=it {{var::item}} | /getvar index=0 it | /setvar key=origmsg | /setvar key=it |
	
	// add y next to n |
	/re-replace find=/(n)(?=[aeiou])/gi replace=$1y | /setvar key=it |
	
	// er to ie |
	/re-replace find=/(?<!\sh)er(?=s?[^a-z])/gi replace=ie | /setvar key=it |
	
	// r and l to w |
	/re-replace find=/[rl]/gi replace=w | /setvar key=it |
	
	// exclamation marks |
	/pass {{random:!,1,1}}!{{random:!,1,1}}!{{random:!,1,1}} |
	/re-replace find=/\!/gi replace={{pipe}} {{getvar::it}} | /setvar key=it |	

	/run addstutters |
	/run uwufy |
	
	/re-escape {{getvar::origmsg}} |
	/re-replace find=/{{pipe}}/ replace=```{{getvar::it}}``` {{getvar::msg}} | /setvar key=msg
:} |

/pass {{getvar::msg}}

qrList.label: changename
